department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Construction Services are required for the addition of a 100kW solar PV system to the roof of the DFO Eastern Area office building in Sydney, Nova Scotia. The work includes the installation of solar panels and associated cabling and testing.
full_summary:
# Invitation to Qualify - Solar PV System Installation
=====================================================

**Notice Reference:** WS3868792162-Doc3869884541
**Solicitation Number:** WS3868792162

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Procurement Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites contractors to participate in the Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) process for the installation of a 100 kW solar PV system at the DFO Eastern Area office building in Sydney, Nova Scotia.

## Key Procurement Details

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Procurement Category:** Construction Services
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Nova Scotia

## ITQ Process

The ITQ process for this procurement is now closed. The tender closing date was **2023-03-08T14:00:00**. The expected contract start date is **2023-03-28**, with no expected contract end date.

## Tender Requirements

Contractors are required to submit a qualified bid, including all necessary documentation and information, to be considered for this procurement. The tender description includes the construction of a 100kW solar PV system, including solar panel installation, associated cabling, and testing.

## Links and Contacts

* **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15461524
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Richard Parsons (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## End of Notice

The ITQ process for this procurement is now closed. Contractors who have already registered and submitted their qualified bids will be contacted by the PSPC for further instructions.  No new bids will be accepted at this time.
